courseDetails.title: Microsoft Power BI Dashboard Design: From Clarity to Impact
courseDetails.shortDescription: Design User-Focused Microsoft Power BI Dashboards with Visual Design Principles, Storytelling, and Real-World Project
courseDetails.longDescription:
Power BI Dashboard Design: From Clarity to Impact – Business Intelligence Mastery

Learn how to create Power BI dashboards that drive real business intelligence insights. This hands-on, practical course teaches you to design dashboards with the end user in mind — from analysts and managers to executives — so your reports are clear, actionable, and decision-ready.

Instead of just building visuals, you’ll learn how to think like a dashboard designer, structure reports for effective data visualization, and transform raw data into meaningful business intelligence insights.

What you’ll learn:

  • Understand different dashboard audiences and how their needs influence layout, visuals, and interactivity

  • Build a consistent dashboard design system using color, fonts, spacing, and layout principles

  • Choose the right Power BI visuals for different types of insights

  • Format visuals for clarity, impact, and professional presentation

  • Apply visual hierarchy, white space, and alignment to improve readability

  • Use storytelling techniques and Power BI interactivity features like tooltips, drill-throughs, and bookmarks

  • Complete a real-world dashboard makeover project, redesigning an existing report to maximize business intelligence impact

By the end of this course, you’ll be able to design Power BI dashboards that are not only visually professional but also persuasive, easy to understand, and built to support data-driven decisions.

If you want your Power BI dashboards to stand out and deliver real business intelligence value, this course is for you.
targetAudiences: Microsoft Power BI users, Data Analysts, consultants, and business professionals who want to design clearer, more impactful dashboards.

courseDetails.title: Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship
courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship, Intrapreneurship, Startup, Business Module, Growth
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship is a program designed to equip professionals with the advanced skills, strategies, and visionary thinking required to navigate the intricate world of modern corporate entrepreneurship. This course offers a deep exploration of the dynamic landscape of corporate innovation and entrepreneurship, covering an  array of topics that are crucial for individuals aiming to spearhead innovation, drive growth, and foster entrepreneurial cultures within established organizations.


Course Outline:

Understanding Modern Corporate Entrepreneurship:

The Role of Innovation: Analyzing the central role of innovation as the driving force behind corporate entrepreneurship and market disruption. Distinguishing Entrepreneurship from Intrapreneurship.

Comparative Analysis: Differentiating between external entrepreneurship and internal intrapreneurship, emphasizing their distinct attributes and applications.

Real-world Case Studies: Exploring diverse examples of both entrepreneurship and intrapreneurship to showcase their practical implications.


Exploring Intrapreneurship Types and Case Studies:

Categories of Intrapreneurial Endeavors: Investigating various forms of intrapreneurship, including product innovation and process enhancement.

Intrapreneurship Success Stories: Examining case studies of successful intrapreneurial initiatives within renowned organizations across industries.


Challenges of Cultivating Corporate Entrepreneurship:

Identifying Obstacles: Analyzing the inherent challenges that organizations face when attempting to foster a culture of corporate entrepreneurship.

Strategies for Overcoming Challenges: Developing proactive strategies to address resistance to change, risk aversion, and organizational inertia.


Taxonomy of Intrapreneurial Personalities:

Intrapreneurial Archetypes: Defining different profiles of intrapreneurs, including idea generators, project champions, and disruptive catalysts.

Nurturing Intrapreneurial Talent: Strategies for recognizing and nurturing individuals with intrapreneurial potential within the workforce.


Nurturing and Leading Intrapreneurs:

Fostering a Supportive Ecosystem: Creating an environment that encourages creativity, experimentation, and calculated risk-taking.

Empowerment Strategies: Providing intrapreneurs with resources, autonomy, and mentorship to propel their innovative endeavors.


Becoming an Intrapreneurial Leader:

Personal Transformation: Cultivating the mindset and skillset necessary for individuals to lead with intrapreneurial spirit within their roles.

Influence and Impact: Strategies for inspiring teams, driving change, and championing innovation from within.


Diverse Models of Corporate Entrepreneurship:

Frameworks for Integration: Exploring a spectrum of models and frameworks organizations can adopt to infuse entrepreneurial principles into their DNA.

Case Studies: Analyzing the practical implementation of various models in successful corporate entrepreneurship initiatives.


Unlocking Growth with Strategic Innovation:

Growth Hacking Strategies: Delving into the innovative techniques and agile approaches that drive rapid business expansion.

Engines of Growth: Investigating the mechanisms that fuel accelerated growth in startups and established enterprises.

Market Expansion Theories and Growth Matrices:


Market Penetration vs. Expansion:

Exploring market expansion theories and their pivotal role in strategic decision-making for growth.

Growth Matrix Applications: Applying growth matrices to identify growth opportunities, allocate resources, and diversify product portfolios.


Corporate Venturing and Innovation Ecosystems:

Corporate Venturing Strategies: Understanding the concept of corporate venturing and its impact on driving innovation through external partnerships.

Navigating Innovation Ecosystems: Examining how organizations can collaborate with startups, academia, and research centers to fuel innovation.


Importance for Companies and Employees:

The landscape of modern business is marked by rapid technological advancements, evolving customer preferences, and dynamic competitive pressures. In such an environment, corporate entrepreneurship stands as a beacon of resilience and adaptability for organizations. The Comprehensive Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship Excellence serves as a critical learning pathway for companies seeking to stay at the forefront of innovation and leverage entrepreneurial agility to secure sustainable growth.


For Companies:

Cultivating Innovation Culture: The course equips companies with the tools and methodologies to foster an innovation-driven culture, enabling them to stay ahead of disruption and drive continuous improvement.

Seizing New Opportunities: Organizations that embrace corporate entrepreneurship are better positioned to identify emerging market trends, seize untapped opportunities, and create innovative solutions that resonate with customers.

Navigating Disruption: The skills gained from this course empower companies to navigate disruptive forces by fostering an agile mindset, encouraging creative problem-solving, and capitalizing on change.


For Employees:

Career Acceleration: Individuals equipped with corporate entrepreneurship skills become invaluable assets to their organizations. They are poised to take on leadership roles, drive strategic initiatives, and contribute significantly to their companies' growth trajectories.

Entrepreneurial Skillset: Learning the art of corporate entrepreneurship imparts a versatile skillset that transcends job titles. Professionals gain the ability to identify market gaps, propose innovative solutions, and drive change even from within established hierarchies.

Personal Branding: Embracing corporate entrepreneurship fosters a reputation for being a proactive, innovative, and dynamic professional. This can open doors to exciting career opportunities and help individuals stand out in competitive job markets.


Leveraging Corporate Entrepreneurship for Career and Business Ventures:

The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship  not only equips individuals with skills to thrive within organizations but also empowers them to embark on entrepreneurial journeys of their own.


Career Advancement: Professionals who demonstrate a keen understanding of corporate entrepreneurship principles are more likely to be considered for leadership positions. Their ability to drive innovation and adapt to changing business landscapes makes them indispensable assets to any organization.


Entrepreneurial Endeavors: Armed with the mindset and skillset of corporate entrepreneurship, individuals are well-equipped to transition from being employees to becoming successful entrepreneurs. The course nurtures the spirit of calculated risk-taking, resource optimization, and strategic thinking – all essential components for entrepreneurial success.


The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship Excellence offers a transformative learning experience that bridges the gap between traditional business approaches and the demands of a rapidly evolving market. It empowers companies to become innovation powerhouses and individuals to carve out exceptional career trajectories or entrepreneurial journeys. Enroll in this program to embark on a transformative journey that merges innovation, leadership, and business acumen into a potent catalyst for growth and success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at management, corporate management, corporate culture, business and for everyone who wants to improve skills and knowledge at management.

courseDetails.title: AI for Beginners: Learn ChatGPT, Gemini, Perplexity and Grok
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master prompts, context handling, productivity & creativity across multiple AI tools- ChatGPT, Gemini, Perplexity & Grok
courseDetails.longDescription:
Artificial Intelligence is transforming the way we learn, work, and create — and mastering it has never been more important. AI for Beginners: Learn ChatGPT, Gemini, Perplexity and Grok is your all-in-one roadmap to understanding and using the world’s most powerful AI tools effectively. Whether you’re a student, entrepreneur, content creator, or professional, this course will equip you with the skills to harness AI for productivity, creativity, and growth.


In this comprehensive guide, you’ll explore four leading AI platforms that are shaping the digital landscape: ChatGPT by OpenAI, Gemini by Google, Perplexity AI, and Grok by xAI. Each of these tools offers unique strengths — and by mastering them, you’ll gain the confidence to choose the right one for every situation. You’ll learn how to use these AIs to write, research, generate ideas, automate workflows, and make smarter decisions in less time.


I’ll begin with ChatGPT, the conversational AI that started a global revolution. You’ll learn how to craft effective prompts, use advanced techniques for writing and brainstorming, and integrate ChatGPT into daily tasks. Then I’ll explore Gemini, Google’s AI assistant that combines powerful search capabilities with seamless integration across Gmail, Docs, and Sheets — helping you research, summarize, and analyze like a pro.


Next, I’ll dive into Perplexity AI, one of the most trusted AI research tools. You’ll discover how it provides accurate, cited answers and how you can use it to validate sources, summarize complex topics, and generate data-driven insights. Then, I’ll explore Grok, the AI developed by Elon Musk’s xAI, known for its humor, personality, and ability to pull live data from X (formerly Twitter). You’ll see how Grok’s conversational style can make learning, communication, and exploration more dynamic.


Throughout this course, I’ll focus on real-world, hands-on learning. You’ll work through guided exercises, explore prompt templates, and complete projects that mirror real-life applications — from writing blog posts and automating emails to conducting AI-driven market research. You’ll also learn how to combine multiple tools together for more advanced workflows, boosting efficiency and creativity at the same time.


I’ll also cover AI ethics, limitations, and best practices — helping you understand when and how to use these technologies responsibly. You’ll learn how to verify AI-generated content, protect your data, and stay compliant with evolving AI usage guidelines. By the end of the course, you’ll not only be fluent in using these platforms but also confident in navigating the broader AI ecosystem safely and effectively.


No prior technical experience is required. Whether you’re completely new to AI or looking to deepen your knowledge, this course is designed to be accessible, engaging, and practical. Each section includes real examples, walkthroughs, and actionable tips so you can immediately apply what you learn to your personal projects or professional workflow.


By the time you finish AI for Beginners, you’ll have a deep understanding of how ChatGPT, Gemini, Perplexity, and Grok work — and how to use them together to supercharge your productivity, creativity, and decision-making. You’ll walk away with the confidence and skills to integrate AI into your daily life, saving hours of time and unlocking new possibilities in your work and creativity.


If you’re ready to stay ahead of the curve and become an AI power user, this course is for you. Let’s start exploring the tools that are shaping the future of technology, communication, and innovation.
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to understand modern AI tools for smarter work and learning.
Students & AI Enthusiasts who want to gain hands-on experience with AI tools.
SEO and marketing experts who want to use AI Tools.
Content creators, entrepreneurs, and freelancers looking to leverage AI for business.

courseDetails.title: Essential Lightroom Course for Beginner to Advanced
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Photo Editing by Adobe Lightroom
courseDetails.longDescription:
Do you want to learn the world’s most powerful and efficient editing application, used by professional photographers? If you are looking to learn Adobe Lightroom from the beginning than you are in right place. This is a beginner level course so we will learn from the very basic.

What is Adobe Lightroom Classic and how does it differ from normal Lightroom?

It's VERY important that you don't get confused by the two! Lightroom Classic, covered in this course, is a program that is used by photographers to view, sort, process and export their images for use elsewhere. Normal Lightroom is a cloud-based sharing program that then shares those exported files (or any other photos for that matter), between your devices - your computer, tablet and smartphone. Normal Lightroom is not covered in this course.

Lets take a look what you will learn from this course:

• Interface and Import

• Image Filter

• White Balance

• Tone

• Vibrance and Saturation

• Skin Retouch

• Spot Healing

• Color Correction

• Adjustment

• Presets

• Effects and more

During Learning if you face any issue than I am always there for you to help you.

Whether you have never used Lightroom or you have opened it and struggled - follow this course with me and together we will take your images and transform them into beautiful, dynamic photographs by using Adobe Lightroom CC.
targetAudiences: Beginner who want to learn Photo Editing in Light Room

courseDetails.title: Excel Formulas and Functions: Tips, Tricks, and Shortcuts
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Excel Formulas and Functions with Essential Tips, Tricks, and Shortcuts to Boost Your Productivity.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Take your spreadsheet skills to the next level with this practical and engaging course on Excel Formulas and Functions. Whether you are new to Microsoft Excel or looking to refine your abilities, this course will help you work smarter, faster, and more confidently.


Excel is one of the most powerful tools in the modern workplace, and mastering its formulas and functions can dramatically improve your productivity. By the end of this course, you’ll understand how to use Excel not just for basic tasks but for meaningful data analysis and problem-solving.


I will start with the foundational formulas every user should know, including SUM, AVERAGE, COUNT, and IF. These building blocks will give you the confidence to handle numbers, text, and logical operations with ease inside Microsoft Excel.


From there, you’ll dive into more advanced Excel functions such as VLOOKUP, XLOOKUP, INDEX, MATCH, and various date and text functions. Each concept is explained clearly, with step-by-step demonstrations that show you exactly how to apply them.


To help you work more efficiently, the course also includes powerful Tips, Tricks, and Shortcuts used by professionals every day. You’ll learn keyboard shortcuts, time-saving techniques, and smart methods that reduce repetitive work and streamline your spreadsheets.


Throughout the course, you’ll practice with real-world examples designed to mirror the types of challenges found in business, finance, marketing, human resources, and data management. These hands-on exercises will give you practical experience applying formulas and functions to real situations.


You’ll also discover how to troubleshoot formulas, avoid common errors, and build spreadsheets that are clean, organized, and easy to maintain. By understanding how Excel thinks and calculates, you’ll gain the confidence to solve problems quickly and effectively.


What You Will Learn

  • Master essential formulas like SUM, AVERAGE, COUNT, IF, VLOOKUP, HLOOKUP, and XLOOKUP

  • Work with text functions: LEFT, RIGHT, MID, CONCAT, TEXTSPLIT, TEXTJOIN

  • Use logical and conditional functions for smarter automation

  • Apply advanced formulas such as INDEX & MATCH, OFFSET, INDIRECT, FILTER, SORT, UNIQUE

  • Use date & time functions to manage schedules and timelines

  • Create dynamic data models using new Excel functions

  • Boost productivity with keyboard shortcuts and quick tricks

  • Solve real-world problems using formula-based techniques

  • Clean, reshape, and analyze data with formula-driven methods

  • Build professional, error-free spreadsheets with confidence


Why Take This Course?

  • This course takes a step-by-step, example-driven approach that ensures you truly understand how each formula works and when to use it. Instead of memorizing formulas, you will learn how to think in Excel—a skill that opens doors in almost every field.

  • With plenty of tips, keyboard shortcuts, and real-life exercises, you’ll become faster, more efficient, and more confident in Excel than ever before.


You’ll learn how to combine multiple functions to create powerful formulas that automate complex tasks. This ability to stack and integrate functions is what separates casual users from advanced Excel practitioners.


Whether your goal is to speed up your workflow, enhance your analytical skills, or impress employers with stronger Excel knowledge, this course provides everything you need. With a blend of formulas, functions, tips, tricks, and shortcuts, you’ll be equipped to work at a professional level.


Enroll today and unlock the full potential of Microsoft Excel. With the right tools and techniques at your fingertips, you’ll transform the way you work and gain valuable skills that can benefit any job, project, or career path.
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to master functions quickly and effectively
Students, professionals, and Excel beginners looking to improve their formula skills
Anyone dealing with business reports, data entry, or data organization
Job seekers preparing for interviews that require Excel knowledge

courseDetails.title: Visio de escritorio 365  ( professional)
courseDetails.shortDescription: La poderosa herramienta de diagramación de Microsoft
courseDetails.longDescription:
Visio es un poderosa herramienta de Microsoft que nos permite crear diagramas para comunicar información de forma visual. Se puede utilizar para crear organigramas, diagramas de red, flujos de trabajo, planos de planta, entre otros.

Visio cuenta con las siguientes características:

  • Biblioteca de plantillas y figuras para crear diagramas

  • Funciones para agregar y conectar imágenes, texto y formas

  • Estilos, efectos, fondos y temas para dar un aspecto profesional a los diagramas

  • Posibilidad de vincular diagramas a datos de Excel, Access o SharePoint

  • Guardar diagramas en la nube y compartirlos con otros usuarios

  • Ver dibujos en dispositivos móviles

  • Trabajo colaborativo en la nube, lo que permite a varios usuarios trabajar en el mismo proyecto de forma simultánea.

Los objetivos del presente curso son:

  • Aprender a abrir archivos y ajustar la interfaz de usuario, agregar una forma y guardar, usar las SmartShapes, conectar formas manualmente, etiquetar formas y conectores

  • Agregar, eliminar y cambiar SmartShapes conectadas, Alinear automáticamente y Espaciar SmartShapes

courseDetails.longDescription:
Mastering data is no longer optional—it's essential. Whether you're a business professional, student, analyst, or someone working with spreadsheets every day, understanding Pivot Tables can completely transform how you organize, interpret, and present information. This course is designed to take you from the basics to advanced techniques, giving you full confidence in using Microsoft Excel Pivot Table tools for real-world Data Analysis. With a clear, step-by-step approach, you will learn not just how Pivot Tables work, but how to use them to uncover insights that drive smart decisions.


In this comprehensive training, we begin by helping you understand why Pivot Tables are one of the most powerful features in Excel. You will explore the core structure of Pivot Tables, learn how to create them from scratch, and understand key components such as rows, columns, values, and filters. Through practical examples, you will see how Pivot Tables instantly summarize large datasets, turning thousands of rows into meaningful information within seconds. Even if you have never used Pivot Tables before, this course ensures that every learner quickly becomes comfortable and capable.


You will explore advanced functionalities such as grouping data, applying number formats, customizing layouts, and using calculated fields. You will also work with Pivot Charts to visually represent your data for clearer presentations and reports. These lessons are filled with real-life business examples, allowing you to practice with scenarios that mirror common workplace tasks. Our goal is to ensure you not only understand the tools but also know how to apply them effectively in your daily responsibilities.


The course also focuses heavily on central Data Analysis skills. You will learn how to clean, organize, and prepare data so your Microsoft Excel Pivot Table reports are both accurate and insightful. Topics such as sorting, filtering, removing duplicates, and structuring tables play an essential role in ensuring your results are reliable. By building a strong foundation in data preparation, you’ll become more efficient and confident when working with large or complex datasets.


One of the highlights of this course is learning how to analyze trends and patterns using Pivot Tables. You will discover how to compare monthly performance, measure year-over-year growth, identify top-performing segments, and evaluate business KPIs—all with simple drag-and-drop tools inside Excel. Whether you work in sales, finance, HR, marketing, or operations, these techniques allow you to create dynamic reports that offer immediate insights and simplify decision-making.


Beyond the instructional lessons, you will also get hands-on practice with real datasets designed to simulate workplace tasks. Each exercise reinforces what you’ve learned and helps you build confidence using Pivot Tables for various Data Analysis needs. By the end of the course, you will be able to create automated dashboards, summarize any dataset, and quickly answer complex data questions—all within Microsoft Excel. This practical, skill-based approach ensures that you can apply your new knowledge immediately at work or in academic projects.

By enrolling in this course, you are investing in a skillset that makes you more productive, more informed, and more valuable in any professional environment. Personal productivity is a crucial skill set for individuals seeking career success and personal happiness in today's fast-paced and demanding world. This comprehensive course on Personal Productivity is designed to provide participants with the necessary tools, strategies, and mindset to optimize their management skills, enhance leadership abilities, and achieve personal and professional goals. By focusing on key topics such as time management, goal setting, and self-development, this course empowers individuals to cultivate a productive and fulfilling life.


Introduction to Personal Productivity

In this module, participants will be introduced to the concept of personal productivity and its significance in their career and overall happiness. They will explore various theories and models related to productivity enhancement, setting the stage for a comprehensive understanding of the course. Key topics include:


The Ying Yang Concept

Understanding the delicate balance between work and personal life is essential for achieving sustainable productivity and maintaining a healthy well-being. Participants will learn strategies to strike a harmonious equilibrium between professional responsibilities and personal fulfillment.


Balance Wheel

The Lecture Balance Wheel is a powerful tool for evaluating and assessing various dimensions of life, such as health, relationships, career, finances, personal growth, and leisure. Participants will learn how to utilize this tool to identify areas that require attention and create a balanced and fulfilling life.


Productivity Pyramid

The Productivity Pyramid provides a structured approach to personal productivity, enabling individuals to prioritize tasks and focus their efforts on high-value activities. T


Values

Understanding one's core values is crucial for aligning personal and professional goals and making decisions that are in harmony with one's true self. Participants will explore their values and learn how to incorporate them into their daily lives to enhance motivation, drive, and overall productivity.


Values Detaily

Delving deeper into the concept of values, participants will learn how to define their values in detail. By understanding their values at a granular level, individuals can make intentional choices that are in line with their authentic selves, leading to increased satisfaction and productivity.


Understanding Burnout

Burnout is a prevalent issue in today's high-pressure work environments, and it can significantly impact both career progression and personal well-being. This module will delve into the causes and symptoms of burnout, as well as strategies to prevent and overcome it. Key topics include:


7 Reasons for Burnout

Participants will gain insights into the seven common causes of burnout, such as excessive workload, lack of control, insufficient support, and conflicting values. Understanding these factors is crucial for identifying and mitigating burnout risks.


Burnout Syndrome

Participants will explore the physical, emotional, and psychological effects of burnout syndrome. They will learn to recognize the warning signs and implement effective strategies to restore well-being and productivity.


Navigating VUCA (Volatility, Uncertainty, Complexity, Ambiguity)

In today's rapidly changing business landscape, individuals need to be equipped with the skills and mindset to navigate VUCA situations effectively. This module will provide participants with the necessary tools to thrive amidst volatility, uncertainty, complexity, and ambiguity.


VUCA Concept

Participants will understand the VUCA framework and its implications in personal and professional contexts. They will learn strategies to manage ambiguity, embrace change, and make informed decisions in dynamic environments.


Henry Ford Theory

Henry Ford's Theory of Productivity emphasizes the importance of efficient processes and time management. Participants will explore Ford's principles and learn how to streamline their workflow, eliminate wasteful activities, and maximize productivity.


Flexibility and Adaptability

In an ever-changing world, being flexible and adaptable is vital for personal and professional growth. This module will focus on developing the mindset and skills necessary to embrace change and thrive in diverse environments.


Developing Flexibility

Participants will learn techniques to develop adaptability, resilience, and agility. They will explore strategies for embracing change, overcoming resistance, and seeking opportunities for personal and professional growth.


Practical Tasks

Throughout the course, participants will engage in five practical tasks aimed at applying the concepts learned. These tasks will challenge participants to integrate productivity techniques into their daily lives, providing opportunities for reflection, feedback, and improvement.


Importance of Learning and Training Personal Productivity for Career and Happiness:

Learning and training personal productivity skills are of paramount importance for individuals seeking career success and personal happiness. Here's why:


Career Success:

Effective time management, goal setting, and self-management skills are fundamental to career advancement and productivity. By learning to prioritize tasks, set clear goals, and manage their time efficiently, individuals can maximize their productivity and achieve professional success. Additionally, developing strong management skills and leadership qualities through personal productivity training allows individuals to effectively lead teams, solve problems, and drive organizational success.


Personal Happiness:

Personal productivity training goes beyond professional success and extends to personal fulfillment and happiness. By optimizing their time and resources, individuals can create a better work-life balance, nurturing their relationships, pursuing personal passions, and prioritizing self-care. Personal productivity skills also foster a positive mindset, resilience, and adaptability, enabling individuals to navigate challenges, manage stress, and maintain overall well-being.


By equipping themselves with management skills, leadership qualities, and a strong foundation in personal productivity, individuals can unlock their full potential, achieve their goals, and lead fulfilling lives. This course serves as a transformative journey towards personal and professional growth, combining the principles of time management, goal setting, and self-development with the principles of happiness, positive psychology, and mindset optimization.
targetAudiences: Course for any who want to develop personal productivity and management skills

How Learning Personal Productivity Skills Can Benefit Career, Business, and Personal Development:

Mastering personal productivity skills has a profound impact on various aspects of professional and personal life. By honing these skills, participants can enhance their management and leadership capabilities, drive business success, and achieve personal development goals. Some of the key benefits include:

Management Skills and Leadership: Personal productivity skills equip individuals with effective time management, task prioritization, and goal-setting techniques, enabling them to lead and manage teams more efficiently.

Business Management and CEO Success: Improved personal productivity directly translates into better business management, enabling CEOs and business leaders to optimize processes, drive productivity gains, and achieve organizational goals.

People Management and Team Management: With enhanced personal productivity skills, managers can effectively manage and delegate tasks, empower their teams, and foster a more productive work environment.

Goal Setting and OKR (Objectives and Key Results): Personal productivity skills help individuals set clear and actionable goals, align their efforts, and track progress using the OKR methodology, driving personal success and organizational growth.

Mindset and Subconscious Mind: Personal productivity training enhances self-awareness, cultivates a growth mindset, and taps into the power of the subconscious mind to overcome obstacles and unlock hidden potential.

Happiness and Positive Psychology: Effective personal productivity practices enhance well-being and happiness by reducing stress, improving work-life balance, and promoting positive psychology principles.

Personality Development and Personal Development: Personal productivity skills contribute to overall personality development by fostering discipline, resilience, and continuous learning, leading to personal growth and self-improvement.

Mindfulness and Coaching: Personal productivity training often incorporates mindfulness techniques, promoting present-moment awareness, stress reduction, and enhanced focus. Additionally, coaching methodologies can provide individual support and guidance throughout the personal productivity journey.

Personal Transformation: Mastering personal productivity skills can lead to transformative changes in all areas of life, empowering individuals to achieve their full potential and experience personal transformation.

Course Full Description and Welcome Letter: Executive Program in Business Administration

This course is designed for beginners and for the ones who already have an experience in management, and, of course, for anyone who is interested in management or has their own production business. This course is effective not only for managers, but also for the CEOs, heads of departments, etc. The course could help to improve your managerial skills and also to create annual company plan, budgets and effectively set organizational goals.


This course contains basic and academic knowledge and instruments of administrative management or business administration. Also, here you can find interesting tools and, for example, different types of organizational structures.


All this information will help you to gain more confidence in your position as a manager or CEO.


The Executive Program in Business Administration is a comprehensive and intensive course designed to equip professionals with the essential knowledge and skills required for effective administrative management in a business environment. This program covers a wide range of topics that are crucial for individuals aspiring to build successful careers or establish their own businesses.


Administrative Management: This topic explores the fundamental principles and practices of administrative management, including decision-making, problem-solving, and effective communication within an organization. Participants learn how to streamline processes, improve productivity, and foster a positive work culture.


The Essence of Business Administration: This module delves into the core concepts and theories that underpin business administration. It focuses on the key functions of management, such as planning, organizing, leading, and controlling, and how they contribute to the overall success of an organization.


Management of Material and Human Resources: This topic addresses the crucial aspects of managing both material resources (e.g., inventory, supplies) and human resources (e.g., recruitment, training, performance evaluation). Participants gain insights into effective resource allocation, talent management, and enhancing employee productivity.


Organizational Structure and Synchronization of Departments: This module examines the design and implementation of organizational structures and explores strategies for coordinating and synchronizing different departments within an organization. Participants learn how to optimize communication and collaboration across teams to achieve organizational goals.


Project Management: This topic introduces participants to the principles and practices of project management, emphasizing the planning, execution, and control of projects. It covers the advantages and disadvantages of project management, various project management methodologies, and techniques for managing risks and stakeholders.


Goal Setting and Planning in Organization: This module focuses on the importance of setting clear goals and developing effective plans to achieve them. Participants learn how to create actionable plans, align goals with organizational objectives, and monitor progress towards achieving desired outcomes.


Ethics of Business: This topic explores the ethical dimensions of business administration and highlights the significance of ethical decision-making and responsible business practices. Participants gain an understanding of ethical frameworks and learn how to navigate complex ethical dilemmas in the business world.


Business Logistics: This module addresses the management of the flow of goods and services within a business. It covers topics such as supply chain management, inventory control, transportation, and distribution. Participants learn how to optimize logistics processes to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction.


Organizational Development Management: This topic focuses on strategies and techniques for managing organizational change and development. Participants gain insights into the importance of adapting to evolving market dynamics, fostering innovation, and building a resilient and agile organization.


Importance of Business Administration for Building a Career and Own Business:


Understanding the principles and practices of business administration is vital for individuals seeking to build successful careers or establish their own businesses. Here's why:


Effective Decision-Making: Business administration equips individuals with the skills to make informed and strategic decisions. This ability is crucial for career advancement as well as entrepreneurial success.


Resource Management: Efficient management of material and human resources is essential for optimizing productivity and achieving business objectives. Business administration provides individuals with the knowledge and tools to effectively allocate and utilize resources.


Organizational Efficiency: By understanding organizational structures and synchronization of departments, individuals can enhance efficiency, streamline processes, and foster a cohesive work environment. These skills are valuable for both career growth and business success.


Project Management: Proficiency in project management is highly sought after in today's dynamic business environment. It allows individuals to effectively plan, execute, and deliver projects, leading to successful outcomes and increased opportunities.


Strategic Planning: The ability to set goals, create actionable plans, and execute them is crucial for career progression and entrepreneurial success. Business administration equips individuals with the skills to develop strategic plans that align with organizational objectives.


Ethical Decision-Making: Ethics play a significant role in business today. Understanding the ethical dimensions of business administration enables individuals to make responsible decisions, maintain integrity, and build trust with stakeholders.


Logistics and Supply Chain Management: Efficient management of business logistics is vital for meeting customer demands and maintaining a competitive edge. Proficiency in logistics and supply chain management enhances career prospects and ensures smooth operations in one's own business.


Organizational Development: The ability to manage organizational change and foster development is critical for career growth and entrepreneurial success. Business administration provides individuals with the skills to adapt to market dynamics and drive organizational growth.


In conclusion, the Executive Program in Business Administration covers a wide range of essential topics that are vital for individuals seeking career advancement or planning to establish their own businesses. By acquiring knowledge and skills in these areas, participants can enhance their professional capabilities and increase their chances of success in the dynamic and competitive business landscape.

The Essence of Business Administration: This module delves into the core concepts and theories that underpin business administration. It focuses on the key functions of management, such as planning, organizing, leading, and controlling, and how they contribute to the overall success of an organization.

Management of Material and Human Resources: This topic addresses the crucial aspects of managing both material resources (e.g., inventory, supplies) and human resources (e.g., recruitment, training, performance evaluation). Participants gain insights into effective resource allocation, talent management, and enhancing employee productivity.

Organizational Structure and Synchronization of Departments: This module examines the design and implementation of organizational structures and explores strategies for coordinating and synchronizing different departments within an organization. Participants learn how to optimize communication and collaboration across teams to achieve organizational goals.

Project Management: This topic introduces participants to the principles and practices of project management, emphasizing the planning, execution, and control of projects. It covers the advantages and disadvantages of project management, various project management methodologies, and techniques for managing risks and stakeholders.

Goal Setting and Planning in Organization: This module focuses on the importance of setting clear goals and developing effective plans to achieve them. Participants learn how to create actionable plans, align goals with organizational objectives, and monitor progress towards achieving desired outcomes.

Ethics of Business: This topic explores the ethical dimensions of business administration and highlights the significance of ethical decision-making and responsible business practices. Participants gain an understanding of ethical frameworks and learn how to navigate complex ethical dilemmas in the business world.

Business Logistics: This module addresses the management of the flow of goods and services within a business. It covers topics such as supply chain management, inventory control, transportation, and distribution. Participants learn how to optimize logistics processes to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction.

Organizational Development Management: This topic focuses on strategies and techniques for managing organizational change and development. Participants gain insights into the importance of adapting to evolving market dynamics, fostering innovation, and building a resilient and agile organization.
Importance of Business Administration for Building a Career and Own Business:
Understanding the principles and practices of business administration is vital for individuals seeking to build successful careers or establish their own businesses. Here's why:

Effective Decision-Making: Business administration equips individuals with the skills to make informed and strategic decisions. This ability is crucial for career advancement as well as entrepreneurial success.

Resource Management: Efficient management of material and human resources is essential for optimizing productivity and achieving business objectives. Business administration provides individuals with the knowledge and tools to effectively allocate and utilize resources.

Organizational Efficiency: By understanding organizational structures and synchronization of departments, individuals can enhance efficiency, streamline processes, and foster a cohesive work environment. These skills are valuable for both career growth and business success.

Project Management: Proficiency in project management is highly sought after in today's dynamic business environment. It allows individuals to effectively plan, execute, and deliver projects, leading to successful outcomes and increased opportunities.

Strategic Planning: The ability to set goals, create actionable plans, and execute them is crucial for career progression and entrepreneurial success. Business administration equips individuals with the skills to develop strategic plans that align with organizational objectives.

Ethical Decision-Making: Ethics play a significant role in business today. Understanding the ethical dimensions of business administration enables individuals to make responsible decisions, maintain integrity, and build trust with stakeholders.

Logistics and Supply Chain Management: Efficient management of business logistics is vital for meeting customer demands and maintaining a competitive edge. Proficiency in logistics and supply chain management enhances career prospects and ensures smooth operations in one's own business.

Organizational Development: The ability to manage organizational change and foster development is critical for career growth and entrepreneurial success. Business administration provides individuals with the skills to adapt to market dynamics and drive organizational growth.

In conclusion, the Executive Program in Business Administration covers a wide range of essential topics that are vital for individuals seeking career advancement or planning to establish their own businesses. By acquiring knowledge and skills in these areas, participants can enhance their professional capabilities and increase their chances of success in the dynamic and competitive business landscape.

Course Author:

Mr. Joao Martins is seasoned manager and entrepreneur, with over 30 years’ experience in top management positions in the telecommunications and IT sectors. Starting in an academic environment, where he obtained his PhD in Engineering and an MBA at Universidade Nova de Lisboa, quickly evolved to C-suite positions in the corporate environment, both in large corporations and in start-ups.

Course Full Description

The Executive Diploma in Operations Management is designed to provide professionals with the knowledge and skills necessary to excel in the field of operations management. This comprehensive course covers key concepts, strategies, and tools used in managing and optimizing business operations. From planning and forecasting to risk management and quality control, participants will gain a deep understanding of the principles and practices that drive operational excellence. The course also explores the role of operations management in leadership, management consulting, and career advancement. Whether you're an aspiring manager, a seasoned professional, or an MBA candidate, this course will equip you with the essential skills needed to thrive in the dynamic world of operations management.


Introduction to Operations Management

  • Understanding the role of operations management in organizations

  • Key concepts, theories, and frameworks in operations management

  • Aligning operations strategy with business objectives

  • The impact of operations management on overall organizational performance


Planning, Forecasting, Controlling, and Quality

  • Strategic planning and tactical decision-making in operations management

  • Demand forecasting techniques and their application

  • Quality management principles, tools, and techniques


Risk Management

  • Identifying and assessing risks in operations

  • Developing risk mitigation strategies


Methods and Approaches

  • Business process reengineering and optimization techniques


Economy of Scope and Scale

  • Understanding economies of scale and scope in operations

  • Cost reduction strategies and efficiency improvements


Tools Examples: Kanban

  • Introduction to Kanban as a visual management tool


Tools Examples: Poka Yoke

  • Understanding Poka Yoke (mistake-proofing) concepts


Importance of Operations Management in Career Building:

Operations management plays a vital role in building a successful career in various fields, including leadership, management, MBA preparation, management consulting, and more. Here are some key reasons why a strong foundation in operations management is crucial for career growth:


  1. Leadership and Management Skills: Operations management equips professionals with essential leadership and management skills. It teaches individuals how to plan, organize, and control resources efficiently, making them effective leaders and managers in any organizational setting.

  2. Business Fundamentals: Operations management provides a deep understanding of the fundamental principles that drive business operations. This knowledge is invaluable for professionals seeking to make strategic decisions, optimize processes, and drive overall business performance.

  3. Project Management: Operations management encompasses project management principles and techniques. By mastering these skills, professionals can successfully execute projects, meet deadlines, manage resources, and deliver high-quality results, making them valuable assets to any organization.

  4. MBA Preparation: For individuals considering pursuing an MBA or other advanced management degrees, a strong foundation in operations management is essential. It provides the necessary knowledge and skills required for success in MBA programs and enhances career prospects in various industries.

  5. Management Consulting: Operations management expertise is highly sought after in the field of management consulting. Professionals with a deep understanding of operations can assist organizations in improving efficiency, reducing costs, and enhancing overall performance, making them valuable consultants to businesses.

The Executive Diploma in Operations Management offers a comprehensive curriculum that covers essential topics and tools required to excel in the field of operations management. By developing a strong understanding of operations management principles and practices, participants will be well-equipped to make strategic decisions, optimize processes, and drive operational excellence in their organizations. Whether you aspire to be a leader, enhance your management skills, pursue an MBA, or excel in management consulting, this course will provide you with the necessary knowledge and skills to achieve your career goals.

courseDetails.title: Power BI DAX Mastery: Advanced Formulas and Data Analysis
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mastering Complex Calculations and Dynamic Reporting in Power BI
courseDetails.longDescription:
"Power BI DAX Mastery" is an intensive training course designed to equip data analysts and business intelligence professionals with advanced skills in Data Analysis Expressions (DAX). This course provides a comprehensive understanding of DAX, enabling participants to build sophisticated data models, create complex calculations, and develop insightful Power BI reports.

Led by expert trainer Ali Noorani, this course focuses on practical applications, best practices, and hands-on problem-solving techniques. Participants will gain valuable insights into DAX's role in data modeling, visualization, and analytics, empowering them to drive data-driven decision-making within their organizations.

By the end of this course, attendees will have mastered advanced DAX functionalities, allowing them to perform in-depth data analysis and create dynamic, interactive reports that provide valuable business insights.

Course Outline:

  1. Introduction to Advanced DAX Concepts

    • Overview of DAX and its importance in Power BI.

    • Key differences between Calculated Columns and Measures.

    • Understanding the foundational principles of DAX.

  2. Building and Optimizing Data Models

    • Introduction to data modeling in Power BI.

    • Best practices for creating and managing data models.

    • Techniques for visualizing data effectively.

  3. Understanding and Applying Filter Context

    • Deep dive into filter context and its impact on DAX calculations.

    • How to use filter context to control data visibility and calculation results.

    • Practical examples of using filter context in real-world scenarios.

  4. Creating and Using Measures

    • Step-by-step guide to creating basic and advanced measures.

    • Techniques for using measures to perform dynamic calculations.

    • Examples of measures for common business scenarios (e.g., total sales, profit margin).

  5. Advanced Problem-Solving with DAX

    • Strategies for solving complex analytical problems using DAX.

    • How to use DAX functions such as CALCULATE, FILTER, and SUMX to solve business problems.

    • Case studies demonstrating the application of DAX for business insights.

  6. Implementing Time Intelligence Functions

    • Overview of time intelligence functions in DAX.

    • Techniques for calculating year-over-year growth, month-over-month trends, and moving averages.

    • Practical exercises to understand time-based calculations and forecasts.

  7. Dynamic Filtering and Interactive Reporting

    • How to implement dynamic filtering using slicers and DAX.

    • Creating interactive reports that respond to user selections.

    • Examples of dynamic reporting for different business dimensions (e.g., by region, by product category).

  8. Creating and Using Calendar Tables

    • Importance of calendar tables in time-based analysis.

    • How to create a calendar table using DAX.

    • Best practices for managing date-related data in Power BI.

  9. Practical Applications of DAX in Business Scenarios

    • Real-world examples of using DAX to address business needs.

    • How to create dashboards that provide actionable insights.

    • Techniques for using DAX to optimize business operations and strategy.
targetAudiences: Business Analysts looking to enhance their data modeling and reporting skills using advanced DAX formulas in Power BI.
Data Professionals who want to deepen their understanding of DAX for complex data calculations and insights.
Excel Power Users transitioning to Power BI and aiming to leverage their existing formula knowledge in a more powerful business intelligence tool.
Power BI Enthusiasts at an intermediate level who are ready to dive into more advanced DAX topics to unlock dynamic and insightful reporting capabilities.

Sniffing: Explore the concept of network packet sniffing to capture and analyze data flowing through networks.

Mac Flooding Attack: Master the technique of overwhelming a network switch to disrupt network connectivity.

Honeypots: Discover the types of honeypots and practical applications for setting up these decoy systems to lure potential attackers.

Deep Web and Dark Web: Understand the distinction between these hidden corners of the internet, and explore their significance in cybersecurity.

Creating Your Own Tor Website: Explore the world of onion services and learn to host websites anonymously on the Tor network.

ExifTool: Harness the power of information gathering through metadata extraction from files.

Webcam Hacking: Gain insight into ethical methods of accessing webcams for security assessment.

Email Footprinting: Learn techniques for tracing email origins and understanding sender behavior.

Whonix: Discover how to fully anonymize your Kali Linux system using Whonix for secure ethical hacking operations.

Keyloggers: Explore the use of keyloggers for monitoring and analyzing user activity.

Finding Social Media Accounts by Usernames: Learn advanced OSINT (Open Source Intelligence) techniques to uncover online profiles.

Junior SOC Analyst Lab: Put your skills to the test in a hands-on lab designed to simulate real-world security operations.


By the end of this course, you will have a comprehensive understanding of advanced ethical hacking techniques and be well-prepared to tackle complex security challenges in an ethical and responsible manner. courseDetails.title: Executive Certificate in Strategic Relationship Management
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Professional Communication, Build Ethical Partnerships, Navigate Organizations with the Swiss Banking Standard
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Executive Certificate in Strategic Relationship Management by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF Institute is a global educational and research institute headquartered in Lisbon, Portugal. We offer hybrid business and professional education in the areas of Business and Management, Science and Technology, and Banking and Finance.

MTF Institute R&D Center conducts research in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, Web3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency and Digital Assets, Digital Transformation, Fin-tech, E-commerce, and the Internet of Things.

MTF Institute is an official partner of Deloitte, IBM, Intel, and Microsoft, and is a member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry and the Union of Trade and Services Associations of Lisbon.

MTF Institute has a global presence across 216 countries and territories and has been chosen by more than 980,000 students.

Join our new course from globally recognized experts: Barbara Gutsch (15+ years of international experience in banking and finance, incl. 7+ years in Swiss private banking as risk and compliance manager) and Olga Margolin (17+ years in Swiss private banking industry, as top executive and business owner, managing international client relationships).


Why Relationship Management is Critical

In the modern professional landscape, relationship management is recognized as both an art and a science. The ability to transform potentially interesting contacts into resourceful, successful, and mutually enriching relationships is the foundation of long-term career success. True professional harmony is built upon a foundation of emotional comfort and trust, which grows from shared values such as honesty, professionalism, reliability, and transparent communication.


Without a strategic framework, relationships often happen by chance; however, this course teaches you how to actively build them to ensure they are sustainable. By mastering these connections, you ensure that your professional network follows you across jobs and systems, taking new shapes as you grow.


The Rising Significance of Soft Skills in 2026

As we move into 2026, the value of "Personal Capital" - strong relationships built on shared values and mutual reliability has never been higher. In an increasingly automated world, the "Constants" of a person their ethical background, cultural skills, and stable inner framework are the primary differentiators in leadership.

Success in 2026 requires navigating a "Golden Middle" where change is possible through focus, will, and persistence. Mastering the professional and social "codex" of communication allows leaders to adapt to shifting environments while remaining sovereign and authentic. Those who can manage their internal core while adapting to external variables will possess the ultimate competitive advantage.


Course Description: The Swiss Banking Standard

Created in Zurich, Switzerland, this course distills over 30 years of combined elite experience in the Swiss financial industry into a pragmatic guide for global leaders. Instructors Barbara Gutsch and Olga Margolina provide a high-level roadmap for navigating client relationships, risk management, and corporate leadership.

The curriculum is built on the proprietary "Law of 50%", which states that every interaction has a 50% probability of becoming a sustainable relationship based on your "Constants". You will learn to:


  • Identify your UBC core (Unconscious qualities, Beliefs, and Capabilities) that travel with you through every career change.

  • Manage the IPEN variables (Intentions, Plans, Environment, and New factors) that are unstable and depend on external decisions.

  • Adopt authentic roles such as "The Mirror" (focusing on others) and "The Housekeeper" (taking care of small organizational details).


Detailed Module Breakdown

Module 1: Foundations of Relationship Management

Explore the law of 50% and learn to distinguish between constant personal elements and environmental variables. Understand that living and interacting from your "Constants" is already 50% of your success.


Module 2: Pragmatic Art

Learn the mechanics of building relationships from scratch or taking over existing ones while maintaining a professional and social "codex". This module covers the ethics of respecting the emotional background of your counterparts.


Module 3: Mental Mindset

Find your internal reference and inner focus regardless of external circumstances. Discover how to be authentically professional by choosing a "home base" role that lightens the effort required to maintain a network.


Module 4: External Alliances

Master the creation of an "introducer circle" and maintain visibility through events and personal attention. Learn how to manage "dormant" relationships so they can become active again when circumstances change.


Module 5: Relationships within an Organisation

Navigate corporate hierarchies using "Penthouse" (top-down) or "Basement" (standard entry) scenarios. Establish "always" and "never" rules for professional conduct, such as always connecting with support staff and never showing visible preferences for one specific colleague.


Exclusive: The Career Accelerator Edition

Why is this course unique?

By enrolling in this special edition, you unlock three strategic career advantages:


1. Dual Certification & Direct Verification Go beyond the standard. Upon completion, you will receive not only the Udemy certificate but also the Official MTF Institute Certificate and Student ID.

· Direct Validation: You will gain access to our automated system to issue your credentials instantly directly from the Institute.

· Credibility: This independent verification adds a layer of professional authority to your CV, recognized by our global partners.


2. Portfolio Building & LinkedIn Visibility In job market, visibility is everything. We don't just teach you skills; we help you showcase them.

· Show, Don't Just Tell: We encourage you to post your course projects and case studies directly to your professional profiles.

· Career Boost: Follow our guidelines to add your new certification to your LinkedIn profile correctly. This simple step significantly improves your visibility to recruiters and demonstrates your commitment to continuous professional development.


3. Access to a Global Professional Community Education is more powerful when shared. You are not learning alone.

· Network: Join thousands of professionals worldwide who trust MTF Institute.

· Stay Informed: Gain the opportunity to subscribe to our industry insights and newsletters, keeping you ahead of trends in management and technology.

Start your transformation from a student to a recognized professional today.

courseDetails.title: How to do Bookkeeping for Beginners (Theory & Practical)
courseDetails.shortDescription: How to Record Financial Transactions in the Accounting System.
courseDetails.longDescription:
What is this Course About?

Practical Bookkeeping is a comprehensive course designed to equip students with the foundational skills to understand the starting point of accounting systems. Acquiring the skills delivered in this course will enable students to manage financial records accurately and efficiently. It is purposefully created for small business owners, aspiring bookkeepers and students considering a career in Accounting or Finance. The course emphasises practical applications and hands-on experience through case scenarios.

Students do not need prior experience in finance to participate in the course. It is a course for beginners.

Why is this Course Relevant?

Let's face it, most bookkeeping courses are filled with accounting jargon, and they often fail to incorporate real-world cases frequently encountered in a job or small business. In this course, every aspect is simplified with clear explanations and illustrations. Bookkeeping is a timeless, in-demand skill that remains in high demand. Every business organisation, from the local café near you to a tech company, needs a clean book. Skills acquired can be utilised to secure a steady job, as in a side hustle, or to gain financial control of your own business. This course provides you with the skills to achieve your goal.

What You Will Learn:

· The importance of the documents businesses issue to customers or receive from suppliers, such as till receipts, cheque book stubs, paying-in stubs, invoices, in recording.

· How to extract information from financial transaction documents such as till receipts, invoices, bank statements, and so on, to record in the first books of the business (the books of original entry/prime entry).

· The basics of Value Added Tax (VAT) as it relates to bookkeeping. This is essential due to the comprehensive nature of the course, implying that at the end of this course, you will know how to calculate VAT on products and services, who is allowed to charge VAT on their products or services, and whether to round up or round down. You will learn the difference between input (purchases) and output (sales) tax.

· The difference between kinds of transactions, cash and credit and how to record each type of transaction.

· Differentiate between bulk, prompt and trade discounts and how each type of discount is deducted from the list price of goods before arriving at the amount due to or from a business.

· The stages in credit purchases and sales until payment is made or received, and the steps to prepare an invoice.

· Differentiate between the general ledger and the subsidiary ledger. What they are and what kind of record goes into them. What are they for? Why are they relevant?

· How to complete the initial trial balance. Where the figures are taken from to complete the trial balance. What happens with the digital system of accounting?

· The principle of the Double-Entry Bookkeeping system- the basis of the digital system of accounting.

· How to record in and maintain the cash book.

· How to account for petty cash in a business.

· The responsibilities of the petty cashier.

· How to check the accuracy of business documents.

· How to carry out reconciliations. For example, a statement of accounts from a credit supplier with the supplier’s account in the purchase ledger.

Who is this Course For?

· A student who has chosen a career path in Accounting or Finance.

· An entrepreneur who wants to reduce the cost of accounting services and learn to do their recording accurately, manage their books confidently and make smarter business decisions.

· A job seeker because the course is comprehensive and covers every aspect of bookkeeping. It can help you to obtain a job as a bookkeeper, finance administrator, or office manager. The course will help you stand out in your curriculum vitae (CV) and interview.

What You Can Achieve After This Course:

By the end of this course, you will be able to:

· Set up and manage a complete accounting system, having acquired the skill to track transactions from how it started in the accounting system.

· Categorise and record income, expenses, assets and liabilities.

· Make informed business decisions on whether to use manual or digital accounting systems.

· Work confidently with clients, even without extensive experience.

· Identify errors and know how and where to begin looking for the likely origin of the error or discrepancy.



What Is Included in the Course?

· 8 + Hours On-Demand Video Lessons with Slides. A step-by-step tutorial created to guide beginners.

· Downloadable Activities to practice and consolidate learning for each lesson.

· Downloadable Answers to the activities for each lesson.


About Me:

Maureen Okwara-Amazu is an educator, accountant, and bookkeeper with a passion for equipping others with business skills. I had the opportunity to deliver both accounting and bookkeeping courses at a college in the UK. Over the years, I have supported many students who have gone on to become accountants and bookkeepers. Bookkeeping doesn’t have to be confusing. I have broken down every complex aspect using plain English.

Due to years of facilitating learning and guiding students both physically and visually, I have made the practical bookkeeping course approachable and understandable.
targetAudiences: This course is designed for a beginner who desire to pursue a career in accounting or finance or who want to be a bookkeeper.

courseDetails.title: The Fundamentals of Inheritance Tax in UK Tax System
courseDetails.shortDescription: Lifetime Tax Paid On Lifetime Transfers, Death Tax Paid In the 7 years before death, Death Estate, and Exemptions.
courseDetails.longDescription:
What is Inheritance Tax Course About?

Inheritance tax is a tax on the estate (property, money and possessions) of an individual who has died. It is delivered on the United Kingdom tax system although the principles can be adjusted to suit other relevant tax systems.

What You Will Learn:

This course teaches you the fundamentals of inheritance tax system including:

· Basic guidelines and rules that support taxation systems.

· How to define important terms that would enable an understanding and calculation of inheritance tax for example residence and domicile.

· Understanding of the principles of inheritance tax for example, how to identify different transfers such as chargeable lifetime, exempt and potentially exempt transfers.

· Obtain knowledge of how to handle the different inheritance tax reliefs available for example, annual exemption, annual reliefs, gifts to charities, marriage/civil partnership gifts and etc.

· How and when to apply the nil rate band and residence nil ratee band,

· Understand the tax rates applicable to lifetime transfers and on death estate.

Who is the IHT Course For?

· It is for learners of accounting, aspiring tax practitioners who wants to understand the fundamentals of inheritance tax system in the UK.

What is included in the IHT Course?

It is important to note that each stage of the course delivered in lessons feeds into the next stage therefore understanding lesson 1 is crucial to your grasping of lesson 2 and so forth. The delivery is divided as follows:

· The Course Outline

· Lesson 1: Introduction and Importance Definitions.

· Lesson 2: Stage 1: Lifetime tax paid on Lifetime transfers.

· Lesson 3: Stage 2: Death tax paid on Lifetime transfers made in the seven years before death.

· Lesson 4: Stage 3: Death tax paid on assets owned at death (death estate) & tax planning.

· Lesson 5: More Illustrations.

About Me:

My name is Maureen; I am an educator who has taught a range of accounting and bookkeeping courses, from basic to advanced, at a college in the United Kingdom for several years. I have delivered all the courses in accounting under National Vocational Studies, from Bookkeeping to the Preparation of Financial Statements, Personal, and Business Tax. Inheritance Tax is an aspect of personal taxation; however, it requires more attention, which is why it is delivered singularly. Through the years of lecturing in college, I have supported many students in their journey to become accountants and bookkeepers. This introduction is to assure you that you are being guided by one who has the knowledge and skills to lead you through the course.
targetAudiences: •	It is for learners of accounting, aspiring tax practitioners who wants to understand the fundamentals of inheritance tax system in the UK. Executors of death estate or tax practitioners who want to learn how to calculate the lifetime inheritance tax for their clients.

courseDetails.title: Generación de Certificados y Diplomas con PHP, MySql y JS
courseDetails.shortDescription: Genera Certificados y Diplomas: PHP, MySQL y JS para un proceso eficiente y personalizado
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bienvenido al curso del desarrollo de un Generación de Certificados y Diplomas con PHP, MySql y JS en PHP POO, PDO, MySQL, JQuery Ajax, Json, Bootstrap, vas a aprender paso a paso como desarrollar un Sistema web desde cero y lo podrás ver en cualquier dispositivo móvil con responsive design.
Vas a aprender como desarrollar sistemas de control de contenidos utilizando el lenguaje de programación más popular y con más oportunidades de trabajo PHP, trabajaremos con la programación orientada a Objetos, PDO (PHP Data Objects) y el gestor de base de datos MySql, para el diseño y la administración de las tablas de la base de datos trabajaremos con la herramienta PhpMyadmin, utilizaremos HTML5, CSS3 para el diseño de las vistas de las páginas web del proyecto, también vamos a trabajar con el framework Bootstrap para hacer más fácil nuestro diseño web, usaremos la librería JQuery y JS, la tecnología Ajax y Json para hacer dinámico nuestras páginas del proyecto web.

Vamos a diseñar las tablas de la base de datos del proyecto utilizando la tecnología PHPMyAdmin.

Vamos a trabajar con una plantilla web y luego la vamos a depurar para adecuarla a nuestro modo.

Haremos la conexión a la base de datos MySQL con el proyecto web usando la conexión PDO(PHP Data Objects).

Con PDO puedes manejar 12 tipos distintos de bases de datos (Oracle, MySQL, SqLite, etc…), con solo cambiar el nombre de la base de datos en la conexión y sin necesidad de rehacer todo el proyecto, además que con PDO nos brinda mucho más seguridad.

Aprenderás a desarrollar CRUD (CREATE, READ, UPDATE, DELETE) de tablas independientes, tablas relacionales y el control de accesos de usuarios a los módulos del Generación de Certificados y Diplomas con PHP, MySql y JS.

Trabajaremos con expresiones regulares para validar los campos del formulario.

Trabajaremos con ventanas modales para agregar, editar y eliminar registros.

Aprenderás como Activar y desactivar los estados de un registro al dar click al botón utilizando Jquery y la tecnología ajax y json.

Aprenderemos a manejar de manera introductoria un diagrama de Gantt, El diagrama de Gantt es una herramienta gráfica cuyo objetivo es exponer el tiempo de dedicación previsto para diferentes tareas o actividades a lo largo de un tiempo total determinado. A pesar de esto, el diagrama de Gantt no indica las relaciones existentes entre actividades.

¿Qué es un tablero Kanban?

El tablero Kanban es la herramienta para mapear y visualizar su flujo de trabajo y uno de los componentes claves del método Kanban. Originalmente, se utilizaba una pizarra blanca (o un tablero de corcho) que se dividía en columnas y filas.

Cada columna visualiza una fase de su proceso y las filas representan diferentes tipos de actividades específicas (diseño, errores, deuda técnica, etc.).

Al mismo tiempo, cada tarea que entra en su flujo de trabajo aparece en el tablero como una tarjeta Kanban. El punto de entrada de cada tarjeta es la columna “Por hacer”.
Hoy en día, existen soluciones de tarjetas Kanban digitales más prácticas y accesibles a nivel global que son perfectas tanto para para los equipos remotos como para los equipos que desarrollan su actividad en el lugar donde se realiza el proyecto.

Si quieres aprender a desarrollar aplicaciones web y manejar un proyecto desde 0 con PHP POO, PDO, MySQL, JQuery Ajax, Json, Bootstrap, diagrama de GANTT, Kanban y GIT subir de nivel en el desarrollo Frontend, Backend y aumentar tus oportunidades laborales ¡Este es tu curso!
targetAudiences: Desarrollares de Software
Desarrolladores de Aplicaciones Web
Programadores de Base de Datos
